articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday met and had a talk in compatriotic atmosphere with a delegation of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star headed by Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman on DPRK Visit by Chinese Foreign Ministry Delegation
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman on DPRK Visit by Chinese Foreign Ministry Delegation
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA Friday as regards the DPRK visit paid by vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of China:
					 The delegation of the Chinese Foreign Ministry headed by its Vice-Minister Liu Zhenmin visited the DPRK from Feb. 17 to 20 and paid a courtesy call on its foreign minister and met with  officials of the Foreign Ministry and the relevant unit and had talks and conservations with them.
					
					 At the talks and conversations both sides had an in-depth exchange of views on the DPRK-China relations, the regional situation, the resumption of the six-party talks and other issues of mutual concern and reached a common understanding.
					
					 Both sides discussed the issues of boosting the traditional DPRK-China friendship and, to this end, promoting the exchange of high-level delegations between the two countries and significantly commemorating the 65th anniversary of the establishment of the DPRK-China diplomatic relations this year.
					
					 As regards the situation on the Korean peninsula and in the region, the Chinese side positively appreciated the fact that the DPRK side fully showed its sincerity to stabilize the situation and improve the inter-Korean relations by taking important measures in the new year and emphasis was put on the DPRK side's stand that the development of the situation in the future depends on the attitude of the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 Both sides decided to make joint efforts to defend peace and stability in the peninsula and the region and resume the six-party talks.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Refutes CI's "Report"
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Refutes CI's "Report"
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Friday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA refuting a "report" recently released by the Commission of Inquiry (CI) on the human rights situations in the DPRK organized under the UN Human Rights Council:
					 The Commission was set up highhandedly at the meeting of the Council last year by the U.S. and its satellite forces out of inveterate repugnance towards the DPRK. The DPRK, therefore, has never recognized its existence as it is no more than a marionette under their clutches.
					
					 The DPRK categorically rejects this "report" as it does not deserve even a passing note. The "report" misrepresents the true picture of the Korean people enjoying genuine rights and is peppered with sheer lies and fabrications deliberately cooked up by hostile forces and riff-raffs such as some "elements with ambiguous identities who defected from the north", criminals escaped from it after committing crimes against the country to earn money.
					
					 They are becoming frantic with their smear campaign against the DPRK while making far-fetched assertions that the "human rights situation" in the DPRK should be referred to the International Criminal Court or to the UN Security Council. This is an extremely dangerous politically-motivated provocation aimed to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK and ramp up pressure on it in a bid to bring down its social system.
					
					 That is why many countries and even various Western media claim that the "report" is so biased that it does not sound plausible, querying how such thing could be distributed as a document of the UN body.
					
					 The U.S., the worst human rights abuser, should be brought to an international human rights tribunal as it killed innocent people in various parts of the world through aggression and intervention, causing unspeakable disasters, and systematically committed illegal wire-tapping and surveillance against citizens of other countries, to say nothing of those in its mainland, sparking uproar.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop its futile anti-DPRK "human rights" racket and mind its own business.

articles.title: Senior Officials of C.C., WPK Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in Conference of Ideological Officials of WPK
articles.content:
Senior Officials of C.C., WPK Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in Conference of Ideological Officials of WPK
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Secretaries of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Friday visited the lodging quarters of the participants in the 8th Conference of Ideological Officials of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The delegates were excited to have the honor of participating in the great conference of ideological officials of the WPK to open on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's proclamation of the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi and other officials of the C.C., the WPK and officials of the armed forces organs met with the participants.
					
					 The officials congratulated the participants on the achievements made by them in modeling the entire party and the whole society on the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, firmly consolidating the politico-ideological position of the Korean revolution and powerfully encouraging all service persons and people to turn out in the drive for embodying the idea of the party and defending the policies of the party.
					
					 The officials asked the ideological officials to deeply grasp the importance of the party ideological work through the conference and glorify forever the undying feats the party performed in ideological construction and conduct all ideological works in such a way as to instill fighting spirit and patriotism into the masses.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 8th Conference of Ideological Officials of the Workers' Party of Korea went to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Friday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them in ardent longing for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Delegations of Chongryon Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegations of Chongryon Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) headed by Thae Sok Sin, department director of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, and a delegation of officials of the Korean Youth League in Japan led by Jong Chi Un, department director of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Members of the delegations looked round the historic relics, being briefed on the immortal story about the historic home in Mangyongdae where Kim Il Sung was born.
					
					 Thae said that the President, who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years and liberated the country, is the pioneer of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the founder of socialist Korea, adding his exploits are shining forever.
					
					 Jong said that whenever he visited there, he vowed to give steady continuity to the lineage of Mangyongdae. He expressed the will to carry forward the lineage of Chongryon and patriotism, remaining loyal to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The delegations also toured the National Gifts Exhibition House, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory, Okryu Children's Hospital, Central Mushroom Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, etc.

articles.title: DFRK Central Committee Meets
articles.content:
DFRK Central Committee Meets 
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK) was held in Pyongyang Thursday.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, Yun Jong Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party, chairmen of the Central Committee of the DFRK, its members and officials concerned.
					
					 Kim Wan Su, chairman of the Central Committee of the DFRK and director of the Secretariat, made an opening speech.
					
					 The nomination of Marshal Kim Jong Un as a candidate for deputy to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) was a manifestation of the absolute support, trust and high loyalty of the army and people to the leader, and a revelation of their firm will to uphold him as the unitary center of unity and leadership and follow him to the last, the speaker said.
					
					 The election of deputies to the 13th SPA is to be held in the presence of Kim Jong Un nominated as a candidate at a crucial historic time of carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche, he noted, adding that the election is of important significance in demonstrating the unbreakable single-minded unity of the leader and the people and the advantages and invincibility of Korean-style socialist system and further consolidating the people's power.
					
					 He stressed that the election will be a big political event of demonstrating the revolutionary will of the army and people of the DPRK to glorify for all ages the undying nation-building exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the might of the DPRK bringing about the great heyday of creation and construction under the uplifted banner of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issue of adopting an appeal of the Central Committee of the DFRK addressed to all Koreans ahead of the election of deputies to the 13th SPA of the DPRK.
					
					 The appeal to all Koreans was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 To greet the election of deputies to the 13th SPA with high political enthusiasm and shining labor feats is a noble duty of citizens and an expression of the strong support and deep trust in the DPRK government, the appeal said, and continued:
					
					 Let us take part in the election of deputies to the SPA as one, deeply aware of its significance and glorify Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses and display once more the might of invincibility of the DPRK!
					
					 Let us hold the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche and glorify for all ages their Juche-oriented idea on nation-building and exploits performed for it!
					
					 Let us uphold the great Comrade Kim Jong Un as the unitary center of unity and leadership!
					
					 Let us rally close around the great Comrade Kim Jong Un, sun of the nation, and work hard for the prosperity of socialist country and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Songun!
					
					 Let us open a wide avenue for the improvement of the north-south relations and make fresh advance for independent reunification under the wise leadership of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, lodestar for the great national unity and the country's reunification!
					
					 Let us achieve firm unity with all countries and all peoples advocating independence and achieve the peace and security of the world and prosperity common to humankind!
					
					 Let us cherish the national pride and self-esteem of nominating the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of our party and people, as a candidate for deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly and strikingly demonstrate once again the might of the single-minded unity of Songun Korea, rallied close around the party and leader.
					
					 Let us take part in the election of deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly and consolidate our revolutionary power as firm as rock!

articles.title: Honorary Doctorate Awarded to Overseas Korean
articles.content:
Honorary Doctorate Awarded to Overseas Korean
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Nam Su, secretary general of the Koreans' Council in New Zealand, was awarded an honorary doctorate in recognition of his contribution to the development of the pomology of the motherland.
					 An awarding ceremony was held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Vice-Premier of the Cabinet Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the State Commission for Conferment of Academic Degrees and Titles of the DPRK, Kang Chun Gum, secretary general of the commission, and officials concerned.

articles.title: 18th Kimjongilia Festival Closes
articles.content:
18th Kimjongilia Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The 18th Kimjongilia Festival closed with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on Friday. It opened on February 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The venue of the festival was crowded with a lot of people day by day as it was decorated with tens of thousands of potted Kimjongilias which brought into full bloom thanks to boundless reverence and ardent loyalty of all service personnel and people and progressive mankind to Kim Jong Il, and varieties of flowers.
					
					 The venue of the festival was visited by officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel and working people of all social strata, school youth and children and foreigners and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, officials concerned, service personnel, working people, school youth and children, overseas compatriots and foreign guests.
					
					 Diplomas of the top prize was awarded to Kim Song Dok-led unit of the Korean People's Army (KPA), Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Kim Chang Sop-led unit of the KPA, the Choe Tae Il-led unit of the KPA and a diploma of the special prize to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 Diplomas of the best prize and prize for excellence went to the Ministry of Agriculture, Ministry of Forestry, Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Ministry of People's Security, State Academy of Sciences, Kyonghung Guidance Bureau, Taesong Guidance Bureau and many other units.
					
					 Cultivators of the units which displayed Kimjongilias after blooming them on a scientific and technological basis were awarded diplomas of the prize for cultivation technique, dozens of service personnel, working people, school youth and children, overseas Koreans and foreigners diplomas of the prize of merits and certificates of the participation in the festival.

articles.title: 29th Festival of Science and Technology of Kim Chaek University of Technology Held
articles.content:
29th Festival of Science and Technology of Kim Chaek University of Technology Held
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The 29th Festival of Science and Technology of Kim Chaek University of Technology took place from February 19 to 21. 
					 It brought together teachers, researchers and postgraduate students of the university. It was divided into eight panels including machine-building industry, IT and energy. At least 160 scientific and technological papers urgently needed for economic development and improvement of people's living standard were presented to the festival.
					
					There took place an exhibition of latest technology and new technological products including modern analyzing apparatuses developed by the university and dissemination of scientific and technical books. 
					
					 Special prize to the papers presented by 15 units and those by 25 teachers and researchers.

articles.title: 29th Festival of Science and Technology of Pyongyang University of Architecture Held
articles.content:
29th Festival of Science and Technology of Pyongyang University of Architecture Held
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The 29th Festival of Science and Technology of Pyongyang University of Architecture took place from February 19 to 21.
					 It brought together teachers, researchers, postgraduate students and students of the university. It was held, divided into the panels of architecture, architectural engineering, building materials, construction machinery, city management, land and environment protection and IT on architecture. At least 150 scientific and technological achievements were presented by organizations and individuals. Exchanged there was experience gained in the researches.
					
					 Over 40 scientific and technological achievements were highly appreciated.
					
					 The Architectural Engineering Faculty and four teachers came first.
					
					 At the closing ceremony diplomas and prizes were awarded to the successful participants.

articles.title: Guidelines for Further Improving Party Ideological Work
articles.content:
Guidelines for Further Improving Party Ideological Work
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- It was in early 1980s that the 6th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was held in the DPRK. The congress set forth important tasks to be carried out by the people in the DPRK. The successful implementation of the tasks required firmly putting the ideological work ahead of others.
					 In view of this requirement, the 4th Conference of Ideological Officials of the WPK took place here in March Juche 70 (1981).
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made public the famous work "On Further Improving Party Ideological Work" at the conference.
					
					 He in the work indicated the tasks to further improve the party ideological work in keeping with the reality, in which a solid foundation has been laid for the party information and agitation.
					
					 The work underscores the need to intensify the ideological education of the party members and other working people to train them to be revolutionaries of Juche-type.
					
					 The work also sets forth tasks to conduct the agitprop work in diverse forms and methods and augment the role of party committees at all levels in guiding the party ideological work.
					
					 After the conference, the party ideological work could be directed at encouraging all the service personnel and people to perform miracles and feats in socialist construction with boundless loyalty to the leader.
					
					 A great leap forward took place in implementing the decision made at the congress while the whole society was imbued with the revolutionary spirit.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of the WPK, many monumental edifices were built in the country, thus laying a solid foundation for the eternal prosperity of the nation.

articles.title: Boundlessly Happy Ski Campers
articles.content:
Boundlessly Happy Ski Campers
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Students and pupils are now enjoying ski camping at the Masikryong Ski Resort. 
					 All the campers are exemplary students and pupils who have been distinguished themselves in study and organizational life.
					
					 Among them are students of 6-1 class of Mathematics Department, Mathematics Faculty of Kim Il Sung University. They have a pride of recording four consecutive wins at the international internet program contest. And some of them are prize winners of the International Math Olympiad.
					
					 Students from Pyongyang University of Architecture won the special prize at the national 3D and 4D design contest of university students. And they drew up the general guide map of the Masikryong Ski Resort.
					
					 Schoolchildren of 2-1 class of Pyongyang Primary School No. 4 are also known as competent pupils winning top places in school contests.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un saw to it that those exemplary students and pupils enjoy ski camping ahead of others.
					
					 The campers are spending pleasant times at the resort built in full harmony with nature, while learning or training skiing.
					
					 Han Song Hye, a student of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA that all facilities and services at the resort are excellent.
					
					 Pak Sol Ju, a student of Pyongyang University of Architecture, said:
					
					 I am the happiest one in the world for enjoying ski camping at the resort. The resort makes me refreshed and inspires new ideas to me.
					
					 I will become a world-famous architect in the future.
					
					 Han Kwang Ryong, a teacher of Kim Il Sung University, said: 
					
					 I was privileged to move to a new apartment built for educators of the university and now enjoy ski camping ahead of others thanks to the loving care shown by the Marshal.
					
					 Truly speaking, I am blessed with all happiness.

articles.title: Mushroom Cultivation Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Mushroom Cultivation Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Mushroom cultivation is gaining momentum throughout the DPRK. 
					 A mushroom cultivation institute was built last year, thus enabling the mushroom cultivation to be put on an industrial and scientific basis.
					
					 Mushroom farms with large production capacity have been set up in all provinces, cities, counties and districts.
					
					 In South Hamgyong Province, even co-op farms have built spore culture rooms, with Tongbong Co-op Farm in Hamju County as a model. 
					
					 The Mangyongdae District School for Nursery Teachers in Pyongyang has produced mushroom in all seasons from 10 years ago.
					
					 The Toksong Coal Mine in Tokchon City is well-known for mass producing mushroom by effective use of waste heat from a bath boiler.
					
					 The Unpha Mine has mass produced mushroom in an abandoned pit while the Haksu Co-op Farm in Taedong County succeeded in applying an open-air cultivation.
					
					 The family of Mun Hye Sun, living in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, cultivated a lot of mushroom with the biggest one weighing 20kg last year.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address underscored the need to launch the campaign for cultivating mushroom on a large scale. 
					
					 In response to his New Year Address, the mushroom farm in Nampho City began culturing spore, while the Kangso Mushroom Farm harvested one ton of mushroom some days ago.
					
					 Pukwon Co-op Farm in Kaechon City set the goal at producing 50 tons every year. And many other units in the country are active in mushroom cultivation.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blames U.S. for Escalating Tension in Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blames U.S. for Escalating Tension in Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is getting impatient to throw a wet blanket over the atmosphere of detente on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Despite the fact that practical measures have been taken for the improved north-south relations, the U.S. are persistent in military provocations against the DPRK while senior officials of the administration terming it a "rogue state" and a "state posing grave threat to security".
					
					 Even at a time when a north-south Red Cross working contact for the reunion of separated families and relatives was underway, the U.S. staged military drills like "400km-long tactical armed forced march" and nuclear striking drill with "B-52" bomber formations involved in south Korea.
					
					 Such drills can not be construed otherwise than criminal and provocative acts aiming at belittling the crucial proposals of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC) for the improved north-south relations and laying an artificial hurdle in the peace-loving efforts of the DPRK for realizing them, and thus keeping the vicious cycle of escalated tension in the peninsula.
					
					 As proved by the crucial proposals and open letter of the NDC, the DPRK remains firm in its will to ease tension and defend peace in the Korean Peninsula by improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Therefore, the DPRK's principled stand and sincere efforts are drawing great support at home and abroad.
					
					 Such developments got on the U.S. nerves. In the last century the U.S. moves for its Asian strategy led to the territorial partition and national division in the peninsula. That is why the U.S. is not pleased to see the present circumstances favorable for reconciliation between the north and the south, unity of the Korean nation and reunification of the country. 
					
					 From the outset of every year, the U.S. used to make a spate of reckless remarks and stage war maneuvers one after another, setting it as customs to aggravate the situation in the Korean Peninsula all the year round. 
					
					 Now it is seeking for an excuse to escalate the tension in the peninsula. It is clearly evidenced by the already worn-out "theory on threat from north Korea" much touted by the U.S. terming the DPRK a "rogue state" and "state posing threat to security". But nobody will bend an ear to its sophism.
					
					 In the present world, the biggest rogue state, state posing threat to security, is none other than the U.S. as it has been keen on nothing but sparking confrontation and regional dispute in every part of the world in a bid to realize its strategy for world supremacy.
					
					 The U.S. nation-splitting policy and military provocation have brought to the Korean nation only antagonism and hostility between the fellow countrymen,  driving the inter-Korean relations to a bankruptcy, escalating the tension and increasing the danger of war in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the region. It is the real intention of the U.S. to keep the vicious cycle of escalated tension in the peninsula so as to use it as a lever for realizing its strategy, heedless of the aspiration and desire of the Korean nation.
					
					 The true color of the U.S. as the kingpin escalating tension in the Korean Peninsula has already been brought to light.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stepping up Modeling of Whole Society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stepping up Modeling of Whole Society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial article calls for dynamically advancing to win a final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving nation holding high the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un . 
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism serves as the lifeline of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution and the guideline in the revolutionary struggle and construction work in our era, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il clearly analyzed and reviewed the century-old history of the idea of the working class with his gifted wisdom and energetic ideological and theoretical activities, formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung into Kimilsungism, proclaimed the programme of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism and glorified Kimilsungism as the guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 In particular, Kim Jong Il developed in depth Kim Il Sung's idea of attaching importance to the army into the Songun revolutionary idea and the Songun political theory and put forward the theory of building a thriving socialist nation. This is immortal feat he performed by remarkably raising the attraction and viability of Kimilsungism. 
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the integral system of the Juche-oriented idea, theory and method and the great revolutionary idea representing the present era and the future of mankind.
					
					 This perfectly indicates the theoretical and practical issues arising in advancing the revolution and construction to victory and the most correct way for realizing the independence of the popular masses.
					
					  The Korean revolution has been put onto a new high stage to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He made sure that the spirit of respecting and loving the people is thoroughly embodied in all works of the party and state activities. This constitutes the important characteristics in his leadership to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 To model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the supreme programme of the WPK and the signpost of victory and prosperity of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 To put the DPRK onto the position of a thriving nation at an early date by bringing about a great leap forward in all fields of the revolution and construction is the way of accelerating the victory of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Liquidate Past Crimes
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Liquidate Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Some time ago U.S. Congressmen submitted a letter to the U.S. State secretary demanding the Japanese government apologize for the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army during the Second World War. The British ambassador to Japan also demanded Japan make an apology and reparation, saying Japan should admit its past crimes.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday comments on this as follows:
					
					 These clearly show that it is an unavoidable historical task of the Japanese government to clear off the crime-woven past and it is a hard-hitting requirement of the world people. 
					
					 Japan, however, is denying it without discretion.
					
					 The Japanese authorities have yet neither admitted nor made an apology and reparation for the past inhuman crimes, going against the trend of the times. This is evidenced by the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 The Japanese chief executive is working hard to evade the blame for the issue, claiming that it has already been settled and it should be discussed by historians or experts in a quiet place. 
					
					 Of late, the new president of NHK said that "there were comfort women in any country which fought a war and why only Japan should be blamed for it?"
					
					 Cloaked sin is bound to be aggravated day by day.
					
					 Japan should come to itself and keep pace with the trend of the times demanding the liquidation of the past wrongdoings, though belatedly.
					
					 It had better behave itself, bearing in mind that it is good for itself to honestly admit its past crimes and make an apology and reparation for them.

articles.title: Minju Joson Denounces Japanese FM's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Minju Joson Denounces Japanese FM's Reckless Remarks
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Japanese Foreign Minister Kishida at a recent press conference said that Japan cannot rule out the possibility of "north Korea escalating the tension" as regards the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills and blustered that "it is important for Japan and the U.S. to have coordinated actions." 
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a commentary in this regard: 
					
					 What Kishida uttered strongly hints at his wicked intention to groundlessly brand the DPRK as a "provoker" without taking the situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula at present into due  consideration. 
					
					 Had the Japanese diplomatic boss been truly concerned about the stable situation in and around the peninsula, he should have given right advice to the U.S., not to the DPRK. 
					
					 However, Kishida is busy pleasing the U.S., keeping mum about its misbehavior though he is well aware of it. 
					
					 These days the Japanese reactionaries are standing totally isolated in Asia for their despicable act of denying history and evading the responsibility for settling their past crimes. They are in such poor position that they are shunned even by their master. 
					
					 Feeling uneasy, the Japanese reactionaries are zealously backing the U.S. in its hostile policy towards the DPRK as a measure to tide over the crisis. 
					
					 It is the cunning calculation of the Japanese reactionaries to come under the strong patronage of the U.S. by boosting the alliance with it under the pretext of "military provocation" from the DPRK, get rid of the diplomatic isolation and create a climate favorable for turning Japan into a military giant and implementing the policy for militarist overseas expansion. 
					
					 In a word, Japan is going so mean as to fish in the troubled waters politically by recklessly toeing the U.S. policy aimed to escalate tension on the peninsula. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to clearly know that their sycophantic idea toward the U.S. and policy of toeing Washington cannot guarantee the future of Japan. 
					
					 If a war breaks out in Korea, Japan will not be safe, either.

articles.title: South Korean Internet Paper Demands Authorities Accept DPRK's Crucial Proposal
articles.content:
South Korean Internet Paper Demands Authorities Accept DPRK's Crucial Proposal
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo on Feb. 8 carried an article demanding the south Korean authorities accept the DPRK's crucial proposal for paving a wide avenue for improved north-south relations.
					 The article said that the DPRK had sent the south Korean authorities the crucial proposal including the halt to the joint military exercises and measures for preventing nuclear disasters.
					
					 The south Korean authorities described Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises as defensive ones, but their assertions have no persuasive power in light of the fact that the exercises will be staged in accordance with OPLAN 5027, a scenario for aggression of the DPRK and, in this course, the largest landing drill, a typical offensive drill, will be staged, the article charged.
					
					 The present "government" should carefully judge the DPRK's crucial proposal, it said, warning it not to be used for the U.S. strategy for checking improved south-north relations.
					
					 The authorities should ponder over which is the way of preventing a war and defending peace in line with the requirement of the situation in which organizations of all social standings are demanding the authorities respond to the DPRK's proposal.

articles.title: Halt to S. Korean Authorities' Crackdown upon Unified Progressive Party Called for
articles.content:
Halt to S. Korean Authorities' Crackdown upon Unified Progressive Party Called for
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. on Feb. 7 staged demonstrations in New York and Los Angeles urging the south Korean authorities to stop the crackdown upon the Unified Progressive Party, according to Minjok Thongsin, internet paper of Koreans in the U.S.
					 The participants charged that after the truth behind the case of illegal interference by the Intelligence Service (IS) of south Korea in the election was disclosed, IS is busying itself suppressing the party in a bid to get rid of the crisis.
					
					 It made heavy penalties demanded for progressive politicians with the fabricated and distorted evidence in collusion with the prosecution, terming the party a political party plotting rebellion, they said.
					
					 They strongly protested against the crackdown upon the opposition party, holding slogan boards "Abolish the Security Law" and "Plotted Rebellion was Fabricated".

articles.title: Decision on Plotted Rebellion Case Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Decision on Plotted Rebellion Case Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on Feb. 18 carried an article in denunciation of the decision on the plotted rebellion case. 
					 The article said that the Suwon District Court of south Korea on Feb. 17 held a trial and sentenced Ri Sok Gi, lawmaker from the Unified Progressive Party, to heavy penalty. 
					
					 The decision is, in a word, a copy of the written arraignments of the Intelligence Service and the prosecution, it said, and went on:
					
					 It is unreasonable that the idea of a political party was branded as "idea of following the north" without verification and the decision of guilty was made. 
					
					 Similar plotted rebellion cases in the period of the past military dictatorship were given verdicts of "not guilty" after several decades. Truth is bound to be probed. 
					
					 The court which shunned the truth will pay a very high price.

articles.title: DPRK Book, Photo and Art Exhibition Opens in China
articles.content:
DPRK Book, Photo and Art Exhibition Opens in China
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book, photo and art exhibition opened in Shanghai, China on Feb. 16 (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il).
					 On display in the exhibition hall were the photos of Kim Jong Il showing his sacred revolutionary career and undying feats and photos documenting revolutionary activities of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Displayed there were the works of the peerlessly great men, books and photos showing the true picture of the prospering DPRK and art pieces associated with the creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at its opening ceremony were figures and citizens in Shanghai and members of the delegation of the Korean Overseas Exhibition General Bureau. 
					
					 Speeches were made by Chinese figures.
					
					 The speakers noted that the exhibition would provide more Chinese people with an opportunity to know better about the efforts of the Korean people to step up the building of a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and their happy life and culture, tradition and customs of Korea.
					
					 They expressed the expectation that the exhibition would offer an occasion of boosting the cultural exchange between the two peoples.
					
					 The exhibition will remain open till Feb. 28.

articles.title: DPRK Book, Photo and Art Exhibitions Open in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Book, Photo and Art Exhibitions Open in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK book, photo and art exhibitions opened with due ceremonies in the art gallery in Komsomolsk-na-Amure City of Russia and DPRK-Russia Cultural Center of Blagobeshensk City of Amur Region on February 14 and 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos documenting immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing the development of Songun Korea and art pieces associated with wisdom and talents of Koreans.
					
					 Present at their opening ceremonies were public figures of different social standings in Komsomolsk-na-Amure City and Amur Region, officials of the DPRK Consulate General in Nakhodka and a delegation of the Korean Overseas Exhibition General Bureau, etc.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 A vice-mayor of the Komsomolsk-na-Amure City said that he was pleased to see the opening of the exhibition showing the reality of daily developing DPRK on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il, adding that the exhibition would provide Russians with an opportunity to know better about the true picture of the DPRK and the culture and tradition of the Korean people. 
					
					 The vice-minister of Culture of the government of the Amur Region said that the Russian people who were honored by Kim Jong Il's visit to Siberian and Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation in August, 2011 were deeply admired by all his efforts and dedication to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of its people.
					
					 The representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia in Blagobeshensk expressed his hope that the exhibition would offer a good occasion of boosting the cultural cooperation between the Russia and DPRK, saying that Russia and the DPRK are the friendly neighbors.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "On the Juche Idea" was published in pamphlet by the Russian Association for Development of Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries on February 13.
					 The work, published on March 31, Juche 71 (1982), clarifies the immortal historic feats President Kim Il Sung performed by founding the Juche idea and its significance. It also deals with the philosophical principles, socio-historical principles, guiding principles of the Juche idea and its historical significance.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by German Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by German Organization
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a statement on February 13 on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's proclamation of the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un clarified in his New Year Address that it is necessary to consolidate the Party organizationally and ideologically, prepare all the members of society as Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists and cement the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks in this significant year, in which the DPRK greets the 40th anniversary of the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism advanced by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism has been successfully realized.
					
					 As Kim Jong Il successfully solved the issue of succession to the leadership, a firm guarantee was provided for the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It was a very wise measure that Kim Jong Il advanced the above-said programme.
					
					 The Korean people are now achieving shining successes in all fields of the socialist construction, holding high the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed by Russian Papers
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed by Russian Papers
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Russian papers dedicated special write-ups to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Patriot No. 6 allotted five pages to several articles illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and photos documenting his revolutionary activities.
					
					 The paper said that Kim Jong Il's life was the one of the leader who won one victory after another, absolutely believing in the people and relying on them. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, leader of the people and world elder statesman, combined theory with practice as one.
					
					 His great exploit was that he formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism.
					
					 It is the fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il that the Korean People's Army has the tremendous capabilities to beat any aggressor forces.
					
					 The Feb. 12th issue of the Vladivostok allotted one whole page to an article titled "Leader of Korean People" accompanied with a photo dealing with the revolutionary activities of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The paper said that all service personnel and people of the DPRK are dynamically pushing forward the building of a thriving nation, united close around the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Un. It went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un possessed all qualities and traits as a leader of the revolution while accompanying Kim Jong Il during his journeys for Songun leadership from long ago.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's extraordinary leadership art, modest and simple personality arouse admiration of all people.
					
					 The Feb. 12th issue of the Rio Panorama and February issue of the Serp I Molot carried special write-ups, praising the sacred revolutionary career, immortal exploits and noble traits of the peerlessly great men, illustrated with photos documenting the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Celebrations took place in different countries from Feb. 9 to 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star). They included film shows in Peru, Indonesia and Romania and meeting, photo exhibition and film show in Iran.
					 On display at the venue of the photo exhibition were photos documenting the immortal Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched "Glorious Birthplace of Kim Jong Il in Mt. Paektu", "Pyongyang Today" and other Korean films.
					
					 The curator of the Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru said that Kim Jong Il was the great leader of the Korean and world revolution as he dedicated his whole life to protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The president of the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran praised Kim Jong Il as an outstanding statesman who turned the DPRK into a socialist power and made an undying contribution to the human cause of independence.
					
					 The manager of the Unido Azidharma Industrial Company of Indonesia said:
					
					 The film show offered an opportunity to know better about the undying feats Kim Jong Il performed in the work of the party, state and army affairs.
					
					 No leader authored so many precious works on socialist construction as Kim Jong Il did. 
					
					 It was under his leadership that the DPRK could firmly protect its sovereignty and dignity from the U.S. threat of aggression and sanctions.

articles.title: Sesionada reunion del CC de FDRP
articles.content:
Sesionada reunion del CC de FDRP
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 20 en esta capital la reunion del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria (FDRP).
					Estuvieron presentes el secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, el presidente del CC del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, Kim Yong Dae, el vicepresidente del CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-U, Yun Jong Ho, los miembros de la presidencia y otros miembros del CC del FDRP y los funcionarios correspondientes.
					
					Pronuncio la palabra de apertura el presidente y director del Secretariado del CC del FDRP, Kim Wan Su.
					
					El orador dijo que la eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como candidato al diputado a la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema resulta una expresion del absoluto apoyo, confianza y fidelidad del ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC hacia su lider y una manifestacion de la ferrea voluntad de ellos de enaltecer al Mariscal como unico centro de unidad y direccion.
					
					Recalco que las venideras elecciones de diputados, que tendran lugar con la presencia del Mariscal en el periodo historico de continuacion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, revisten gran importancia en hacer galas de la solida unidad monolitica entre el lider y el pueblo y de la superioridad y el caracter invencible del regimen socialista al estilo coreano y en consolidar mas firmemente el poder popular.
					
					Asevero que sera un acontecimiento politico para demostrar la voluntad revolucionaria del ejercito y pueblo coreanos de glorificar las imperecederas proezas de construccion del Estado de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y el poderio de la RPDC que abre la era de prosperidad para la creacion y construccion bajo la bandera de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo.
					
					La reunion debatio el problema de adoptar un llamamiento del CC del FDRP a todo el pueblo coreano con motivo de las referidas elecciones.
					
					Se aprobo el llamamiento cuyo contenido resumido sigue abajo:
					
					Acoger las elecciones de diputados con elevado entusiasmo politico y notables exitos laborales deviene la noble obligacion del ciudadano de la RPDC y el testimonio del irrestricto apoyo y confianza en el poder de ella.
					
					!Hagamos brillar el socialismo a nuestro estilo centrado en las masas populares y pongamos otra vez de pleno manifiesto el poderio de la Republica al participar como un solo hombre en las elecciones de diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema dandonos cuenta de su gran importancia!
					
					!Enaltezcamos para siempre como Sol del Juche a los companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y glorifiquemos generacion tras generacion la autoctona idea y las hazanas de ellos realizadas en la construccion del Estado!
					
					!Apoyemos al companero Kim Jong Un como unico centro de unidad y direccion!
					
					!Nos unamos compactamente en torno al companero Kim Jong Un, Sol de la nacion, y luchemos dinamicamente por la prosperidad de la patria socialista y el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Songun!
					
					!Logremos nuevo avance en la reunificacion independiente abriendo la ruta de mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas bajo la sabia orientacion del companero Kim Jong Un, lucero de la gran unidad nacional y reunificacion de la patria!
					
					!Logremos la paz y la seguridad del mundo y la prosperidad comun de la humanidad uniendonos con firmeza con todos los paises y pueblos defensores de la independencia!
					
					!Ostentemos otra vez a todo el mundo el poderio de la unidad monolitica de la Corea del Songun en torno al Partido y al lider, sintiendonos orgullosos de haber elegido al companero Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente de nuestro Partido y pueblo, como candidato al diputado a la APS!
					
					!Consolidemos mas nuestro poder revolucionario al acudir todos a las urnas!

articles.title: Conferido doctorado a compatriota residente en Nueva Zelanda
articles.content:
Conferido doctorado a compatriota residente en Nueva Zelanda
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- Fue otorgado el titulo de doctor honoris causa de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a Kim Nam Su, secretario general del Consejo de Coreanos en Nueva Zelanda, quien contribuyo al desarrollo de la fruticultura en la patria.
					La ceremonia de otorgamiento tuvo lugar hoy en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, quien es presidente del Comite Estatal de Otorgamiento de Titulos Academicos y Grados Docentes de la RPDC, Kang Chun Gum, secretaria del mismo comite, y otros funcionarios.

articles.title: Efectuado XXIX festival cientifico y tecnico de Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek
articles.content:
Efectuado XXIX festival cientifico y tecnico de Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 19 al 21 el XXIX festival cientifico y tecnico de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek con la participacion de los profesores, investigadores y los cursantes del instituto doctoral.
					El festival dividido en 8 secciones, inclusive la industria mecanica, la tecnologia IT y la energia, fue realizado en forma de la presentacion y la exhibicion. 
					
					Fueron publicadas mas de 160 datos cientificos y tecnicos necesarios para el desarrollo economico y la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					Durante el festival, se llevaron a cabo la exhibicion de las tecnologias de punta y nuevos productos tecnicos, alusiva a los aparatos de analisis y otros productos modernos desarrollados por la universidad, y la divulgacion de libros cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					Las monografias presentadas por 15 unidades y las otras publicadas por 25 profesores e investigadores ocuparon el primer lugar.

articles.title: Terminado XXIX festival cientifico y tecnico de Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Terminado XXIX festival cientifico y tecnico de Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 19 al 21 el XXIX festival cientifico y tecnico de la Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang.
					El festival se desarrollo dividido en las secciones de la arquitectura, la ingenieria arquitectonica, los materiales de la rama, la maquinaria de construccion, la administracion urbana, la proteccion territorial y ambiental y la tecnologia informatica de arquitectura.
					
					Participaron en la ocasion los profesores, los investigadores, los cursantes del instituto doctoral y los estudiantes.
					
					Mas de 150 datos de exitos cientificos y tecnicos quedaron publicados a nombre colectivo e individual y se intercambiaron las experiencias alcanzados en la investigacion.
					
					Mas de 40 de ellos obtuvieron buena evaluacion.
					
					La facultad de la ingenieria arquitectonica y 4 profesores ocuparon el primer lugar de la categoria colectiva y en la individual.
					
					En la ceremonia de clausura, los participantes sobresalientes recibieron el diploma y premios.
